org.netbeans.a11y
Class AccessibilityTestCase

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.netbeans.a11y.AccessibilityTestCase
public abstract class AccessibilityTestCase
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class defining a test case for accessibility tests.

writer

protected java.io.PrintWriter writer
The writer that the report is sent to. The default value is System.out but subclasses can specify their own.

setUp

public abstract java.awt.Component setUp()
Initialize the test.

The implementation of this method should create the component and make it visible if necessary.

Returns:
a reference to the component to be tested, or null if setup failed

tearDown

public abstract void tearDown()
Clean up after performing the test.

Typically, this will be closing dialogs, etc. This method should execute cleanly even if setUp failed.

public java.lang.String getDescription()
Get a description of this test.

Returns:
the description
